issue.title: Could we add a choke to the solar array power cable

content.raw:
Yes, I like that design. The battery being below the grip creates an edge so that the hand does not slip off the bottom. The grip is fairly skinner so that the hand will natural want to center there. The business end of the tool is normal to the work surface while the hand is in a comfortable position and close to the center of the range of motion.

https://www.spacetelescope.org/images/sts103_731_017/

Probably a little late to get these kinds of enhancements. I know our hosts are working hard and probably getting a little tried of our suggestions.
content.html:
Yes, I like that design. The battery being below the grip creates an edge so that the hand does not slip off the bottom. The grip is fairly skinner so that the hand will natural want to center there. The business end of the tool is normal to the work surface while the hand is in a comfortable position and close to the center of the range of motion.

https://www.spacetelescope.org/images/sts103_731_017/

Probably a little late to get these kinds of enhancements. I know our hosts are working hard and probably getting a little tried of our suggestions.
